data.name: Whiskered Away
data.detailed_description:
YOU MAY ALSO LIKE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/740040/Play_With_Gilbert__Remake/


About the Game

Play as Gilbert or Skye and join them as they get whiskered away on a whole new adventure! Whiskered Away is a fun stress-free 2D platformer where you'll meet funny, quirky and interesting characters on your way.


A mysterious letter tasks Gilbert and Skye to head into the world, collecting as many (healthy) snacks and treats along the way. Make new friends while you make your way to Furball Meadows. Explore and find new areas and unlock new abilities to be able to progress further.

  • A FUN STRESS-FREE ADVENTURE

    Go on a fun adventure with mild platforming, no need to stress out too much and explore lots of different places while meeting new characters with their own personalities.

  • MEET A CAST OF QUIRKY CHARACTERS

    Make lots of new animal friends on your journey. Some may have tasks for you while others may just want to share a story or they may teach you new moves.

data.short_description: Whiskered Away is a fun, stress-free 2D platformer starring Gilbert and Skye!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
